name: An ABDL Christmas story 2
description:
If you follow my Patreon you can access all of my games for 12$.

Do NOT buy it here!

My Patreon page: 

https://www.patreon.com/dlnbindustry 

Merry Christmas to everyone!

The game is a fun fiction about Melanie Martinez's Xmas concert and her new back-up dancer.

I hope you like my latest Christmas, ABDL-themed game.
